name: Toko Toko Trouble: Chikyuu Itadaki!
overview: Toko Toko Trouble: Chikyuu Itadaki! is a puzzle game in which the player takes the role of young kid that have to stop an alien invasion destroying the alien forces. The gameplay is the classical 2d puzzle game with the difference that in this game the player can destroy some of the pieces and use the spaceship hand to push the others to make some of them join and disappear. The game features a challenging difficulty level and different game modes.
